com.lambdaworks.redis.codec

Class ByteArrayCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lambdaworks.redis.codec.ByteArrayCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RedisCodec<byte[],byte[]>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommandArgs.ExperimentalByteArrayCodec

    public class ByteArrayCodec
extends Object
implements RedisCodec<byte[],byte[]>
    A RedisCodec that uses plain byte arrays.
    Since:
    3.3
    Author:
    Mark Paluch
